item.title: The `ls` Guide
item.description: You must be wondering why even bother reading a post about ls command out of all the commands. It’s hard to remember all the options, so here’s a cheat sheet. It’s a handy tool to search through a pile of files, so why not read more about it. Some awesome tools, I came across - shared at the end. ls - this command is used for listing directory contents on *nix OS.
